# PRODUCTION SIGN-OFF REPORT
## Global SaaS Marketing Platform

**Version:** 1.0.0
**Architecture:** AWS EKS Native (No External Integrations)
**Generated:** 2026-01-05
**Generated By:** Claude Multi-Agent Verification System v1.0.0

---

## Executive Summary

The Global SaaS Marketing Platform has been developed according to the UNIFIED MASTER PROMPT specification. This document provides the comprehensive sign-off status for production deployment.

### Platform Overview

- **Core Principle:** Self-advertising through organic SEO, not paid advertising APIs
- **Infrastructure:** AWS EKS with Terraform-managed resources
- **Services:** 12 microservices (11 marketing + 1 community)
- **API Endpoints:** 150+ endpoints across all services

## Deployment Commands

### Deploy Infrastructure
```bash
cd terraform/environments/prod
terraform init
terraform plan -out=tfplan
terraform apply tfplan
```

### Deploy Services
```bash
helm dependency update terraform/helm/charts/saas-marketing-platform
helm upgrade --install marketing-platform terraform/helm/charts/saas-marketing-platform \
  -f terraform/helm/values/prod.yaml \
  --namespace marketing \
  --create-namespace
```

### Apply Kubernetes Configurations
```bash
kubectl apply -f k8s/namespaces/namespaces.yaml
kubectl apply -f k8s/namespaces/resource-quotas.yaml
kubectl apply -f k8s/namespaces/limit-ranges.yaml
kubectl apply -f k8s/namespaces/network-policies.yaml
```

### Run Verification
```bash
cd verification
npm install
npm run verify
npm run report
```

---

## Post-Deployment Verification

1. Verify all pods are running: `kubectl get pods -A`
2. Check service health: `curl https://api.example.com/health`
3. Verify sitemap: `curl https://example.com/sitemap.xml`
4. Check robots.txt: `curl https://example.com/robots.txt`
5. Run SEO audit: `npm run verify:seo`
